name: Ball Platformer Adventure
description:
Space bar - move flipper

new level push button RESTART (in the corner )

Pass the level with the ball avoiding various obstacles, help the cat get his ball. Pass the level without touching the floor to get to the finish line will not be easy.The game has 18 different levels, differing in design and difficulty, made in a cartoonish flat graphics style.You have to be on a farm, at an airport, in a park, on a train and in other interesting places. 

The game combines several genres: 2d pinball, platformer, flipper.
